column4: http://i361.photobucket.com/albums/oo51/deftone76/snapshot1.png o.k i can't stop this window from popping up at boot-up....any help would be appreciated. Thanks
it's driving me crazy that i can't find the setting to keep that window from popping up....geeeez
try closing all applications, go to system -> preferences -> sessions -> options and click "remember all running applications"
